summary: A simple modification that takes the Sabre Cat body model, and uses it for a Pahmar follower.
descriptionHtml:
*I apologize for my recent absence and lack of updates on this file. I've been busy and lost the desire to improve it for a while. v3.0 fixes most of the bugs and adds a lot of the things I promised to do but never did. It'll also probably be among the last updates, unless you people offer more ideas*


The Pahmar: A little-known, tiger-like form of Khajiit born under a new Secunda and full Masser, the two moons of Tamriel.

This mod, in essence, allows you to enjoy the perks of having a talking tiger as your best friend. You're welcome.

Pah'zar can be found in Ahkari's Khajiit caravan alongside the other Khajiit warrior follower, Kharjo. He runs significantly faster than them, so he'll usually arrive at their resting points long before the rest of the caravan.


Current Features:
-Pah'zar, the Pahmar follower
-Fully functional follower using the default Khajiit Male voice-type

Possible Features:
-Give me a suggestion, and I MAY add it. It's worth a shot.


Possible Side-Mod:
-Adding Pahmar to levelled NPC lists, simply to make encounter combat more interesting (Feedback on this idea would be appreciated)

Permissions: I haven't really added anything to the game file-wise, so I cannot claim ownership in any way but in the concept. If you wish to post this file somewhere else, feel free, but make sure you credit the original author (Me). If you wish to modify and re-upload this mod, notify me first, but I'm sure I'll be okay with it.

Changelog:

v3.1:
-Fixed invisible Pah'zar bug (Which no one reported)

v3.0:
-Added Pah'zar to Khajiit caravan
-Actually fixed his aggression problems (I claimed I had before, but I lied D: )
v2.0:
-Added Pahmar texture and mesh, making Pah'zar actually look like a Pahmar. - Thanks to GendunDrup

v1.1:
-Added Changelog to Description page
-Fixed Khajiit hostilities noted by bosmer96

v1.0:
-Initial Release


Credit:
-Muppetpuppet for the Pahmar texture and mesh
-GendunDrup for consolidating the files into one resource
author: GreatSilentOne
